sentences.en: ‘What day is it today?’ ‘Friday.’
sentences.cn: “今天星期几？” “星期五。”

sentences.en: As the day goes on, the pollen dries up and becomes hard.
sentences.cn: 日子一天天过去，花粉干结成了硬块。

sentences.en: Carpe diem. Seize the day, boys. Make your lives extraordinary.
sentences.cn: 人生就应该是快乐的，要抓住每一天，孩子们，让你们的生活变得非凡起来。

sentences.en: children need a firm hand from day one.
sentences.cn: 孩子们从一开始就该严格管教。

sentences.en: Come on, Bill. Send Tom a card and make his day.
sentences.cn: 来吧，比尔。给汤姆寄张卡片让他高兴高兴吧。

sentences.en: day by day I grew worse.
sentences.cn: 一天天地我的情况越来越糟。

sentences.en: dodging sharks is all in a day's work for some scientists.
sentences.cn: 对一些科学家来说躲避存心诈骗者是家常便饭。

sentences.en: He became one of the best known actors of his day.
sentences.cn: 他成了他那个时期最著名的演员之一。

sentences.en: He left two days ago.
sentences.cn: 他两天前离开的。

sentences.en: he must be seventy if he's a day.
sentences.cn: 他肯定至少有70岁了。

sentences.en: I got an email from Sue the other day (= a few days ago ) .
sentences.cn: 前几天，我收到休发来的一封电子邮件。

sentences.en: I had a busy day and was rather tired.
sentences.cn: 今天很忙，我累坏了。

sentences.en: I saw Jane the day before yesterday .
sentences.cn: 前天我看到了简。

sentences.en: I want the manager'sjob when he calls it a day.
sentences.cn: 等到经理不干了之后，我想接替他的位子。

sentences.en: I’ll call you in a couple of days.
sentences.cn: 我过两天给你电话。

sentences.en: Interior decoration by careful coordination seems to have had its day.
sentences.cn: 精心搭配的室内装饰似乎已不再受欢迎了。

sentences.en: It was a cold blustery day.
sentences.cn: 那是个寒风呼啸的冷天。

sentences.en: Kept in that dark cell, I could no longer tell whether it was day or night.
sentences.cn: 我被关在那个漆黑的牢房里，不知是白天还是黑夜。

sentences.en: More than six million youngsters tune in to Blockbusters every day.
sentences.cn: 每天有600多万年轻人收看“热门大片”这档节目。

sentences.en: Officials were self-congratulatory about how well the day had gone.
sentences.cn: 官员们对那一天的顺利度过自鸣得意。

sentences.en: On Sunday Cohen lay around the house all day.
sentences.cn: 科恩星期天一整天都在家无所事事。

sentences.en: Once at Elgin day-trippers visit a number of local sights.
sentences.cn: 一到达埃尔金，一日游的游客就参观了一些当地的风景名胜。

sentences.en: power dressing has had its day.
sentences.cn: 包装成权势人物已经过时了。

sentences.en: She only leaves her house during the day.
sentences.cn: 她只在白天出门。

sentences.en: Someone comes in every day to check all is in order.
sentences.cn: 每天都有人来检查是否一切都井然有序。

sentences.en: the campaign is growing by the day.
sentences.cn: 运动日益蓬勃。

sentences.en: The day dawned (= started ) bright and clear.
sentences.cn: 拂晓时天朗气清。

sentences.en: the district is patrolled day and night.
sentences.cn: 该地区有人日夜巡逻。

sentences.en: The newspaper job had me doing the same thing day after day.
sentences.cn: 这份报社的工作让我日复一日地做着同样的事。

sentences.en: they could outfight the police any day.
sentences.cn: 他们随时都可以打败警方。

sentences.en: they could outfight the police any day.
sentences.cn: 他们随时都可以打败警方。

sentences.en: Try to eat at least four slices of bread a day.
sentences.cn: 每天尽量至少吃4片面包。

sentences.en: We had lunch the other day at our favorite restaurant.
sentences.cn: 前两天我们在最喜欢的餐馆吃了午饭。

sentences.en: We spent three days in Paris.
sentences.cn: 我们在巴黎度过了三天。

sentences.en: We’re leaving for New York the day after tomorrow .
sentences.cn: 我们后天启程去纽约。

sentences.en: Women generally use up about 2,000 calories a day (= each day ) .
sentences.cn: 女性一般每天消耗大约2,000卡路里。

phrases.phrase: all in a (或 the) day's work
phrases.tran_cn: （特别或困难的事）日常的，家常便饭的
另一天，又一天；改日；吉日
(非正式)任何时候，随便哪一天

phrases.phrase: at the end of the day

phrases.tran_cn: 清算的日子，报应到来的时刻，最后审判日

phrases.phrase: don't give up the day job
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式，幽默)做好眼下的工作（让某人不要追求不可能成功的事情）

phrases.phrase: if he (或 she 等) is a day
phrases.tran_cn: 至少（加在关于某人年龄的话语之后）
（将来）有一天；总有一天；（过去）某一天
总有一天；将来有一天；来日

trans.tran_en: the period of time between when it gets light in the morning and when it gets dark
